title: mochi86_
author: mochi86_
content: Acknowledgement:I am only sharing information I have found online, everything I mention can be found on the internet. I did not make up anything mentioned below and have no intention on spreading any false information. This post is only for documenting purposes and community thoughts... That's it I stumbled across a guy named Mike Hydes claiming to be one of the main architects for Bitcoin, Monero, the lightning network, yada yada.https://uk.linkedin.com/in/mikehydes <-- That's his LinkedIn profile. It was made in 2009 according to LinkedInHe makes a very bold statement that he worked alongside Satoshi Nakamoto and know Satoshi personally. He claims that Satoshi Nakamoto isn't a he but two women... One being Vitalik Buterin's aunt Natasha and the other being Anastasia, the sister to Elena Sinelnikova...Looking through what he's claimed about them, he claims that they were part of the Cicada 3301 group and that they were assigned the task to create a decentralized currency being Bitcoin.However, he claims to be recovering from retrograde amnesia in his profile.I was only able to find his Medium account but I'm sure he has other socials or something out there.Medium: https://medium.com/@mikehydesOne very strange thing about this Mike Hydes character, is that he mentions his brother Leslie Hydes Jr but when you search him up, his obituary pops up and that he died in 2020... But his LinkedIn profile was made in like 2021 or something. That's the most strangest thing I've found about.It all sounds very absurd, I know.However, don't go accusing me of spreading misinformation!! I swear, I make this warning every time but nobody seems to listen!I am only documenting what I found through these posts I make. I do not claim to know these information from myself but that I found someone else claiming this knowledge.By sharing this finding, I am only handing this case over to those who are willing to continue this rabbithole, whether it results in anything or not. I am also open to community comments! Thanks in advance!

comments.author: mochi86_
comments.created_time: October 11, 2024, 08:30:57 PMLast edit: October 13, 2024, 08:32:15 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Just 7 hours ago, this Mike Hydes character mentionsQuote from: Mike Hydes on LinkedIn... all blockchain entries are negotiable instruments and as such they are under the jurisdiction of both state and federal authorities in the USA.At the Federal level the primary authority would be the U.S. Secret Service and for those tokens that give purchasers a claim on current and future assets or liabilities, they would fall under the jurisdiction of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, no rocket science there.Same for those NFTs that have some relationship to real world objects.It's not necessarily related to him knowing Satoshi but I wanted to know if what he's saying is even true. I remember laws on crypto being passed and everything but I never really dug into what those laws really go over in between the lines.Can someone clarify this info? Thank you!He has a post from 4 weeks ago stating the following:Quote from: Mike Hydes on LinkedInMany of the leading figures in Crypto have a background in the USAF.I find this to be curious and I have a vague recollection of the USAF being mentioned in addition to the NSA by a team of individuals initially claimed to be from the U.S. Department of State but latter claimed to be from the Central Intelligence Agency, and said they were assigned to protect my brother Leslie Hydes Jr.They said the NSA/CSS were responsible for the suppression of the identities behind the 'Satoshi Nakamoto" pseudonym. That term is a portmanteau of the individual pseudonyms of the two original Bitcoin developers. Satoshi is Natasha, the maternal aunt of Vitalik Buterin, founder of etehreum.org, and Nakamoto is Anastasia, the sister of Elena Sinelnikova, the founder of cryptochicks.ca.. Everyone knew and acknowledged this from 2013 - 2017.I know that USAF officers dominate the leadership of the NSA and its Central Security Service. These recollections came back to me seeing the image on this article, it's a very interesting fact of the Crypto industry.The team who claimed to be from the USD/CIA told me to get in touch with the U.S. Department of Justice regarding the issue but I forgot to to that until recently. They said it was questionable as to whether the other agencies were acting constitutionally/legally.There's nothing in the article about all of this but the image was what jogged my memory. The article is about Bitcoin's price movements...This Mike Hydes seems to know just enough about the government structure and stuff to be mentioning these claims. Is there anyone on this forum who knows what he's talking about?He also mentioned a month ago:Quote from: Mike Hydes on LinkedInThank you to all my old LinkedIn connections for reconnecting!Most of you were also friends on Facebook and remember my disclosure about Bitcoin, indeed I pitched many of you on it.Now I see that many of you are actually working in the Crypto space, and I can't tell you how that makes me feel.Its been a while since i last heard from my old colleagues Natasha ("Satoshi") and Anastasia ("Nakamoto'). I last saw Anastasia in Birmingham England in 2017.I last saw Natasha in 2020 in the Caymans, she was working with my brother and some British agents embedded among the local authorities there to address some injustice that happened to my brother and I over the years.If I remember correctly they are supposed to touch base with me at a certain time here in the United Kingdom. I certainly hope so as I need their support.This is actually I very trying time for me and I'm very thankful to be alive all things considering.Once again thank you all for reconnecting!Btw, I'm in the market for a job. Please have a look at my updated profile and message me if you think I can be of value to your business.Thank you and have a great day!He once again claims to work on Bitcoin and have pitched the idea of Bitcoin to these people in his 'connection'.I understand that he may be spouting nonsense but something about him doesn't seem right... Something about this Mike Hydes character is very off but I can't seem to put my finger on it. Maybe he really is crazy or there's more to it than that...?

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Just a single advice about your posting pattern, here on the forum, it is important that we should know how to make posts in other not to fall under the category of spammers trolling around, form my observation, the said topic headline has been discussed on several occasions, secondly, whenever you're making a post, its always important that you allow others to reply after your post before making another reply to avoid spamming.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Is this thread a diary of everything Mike Hydes has said and is going to say? It is funny but that is what it looks like, making multiple posts in a row is also against the rules of the forum. You should form your own opinion of what he says and start a thread on it, it will make more sense and will get more replies. For whatever it is worth, i think his claims sounds like bs and not really relevant.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: If he really knows Satoshi Nakamoto then he should be able to make Satoshi Nakamoto show some sign or something like that to prove he knows him other than that is he only share it that he knows for other reason. In my opinion, this is just the same as someone claiming to be Satoshi Nakamoto and no proof to prove it. Op, you said you only found the information online and you should. You can just edit OP to post the new information you found and doesn't need to make a new reply.

comments.author: AVE5
comments.body: For Satoshi Nakamoto decided to stay anonymous and people going about claiming to know him/her/them in persons are just endangering themselves from the forebeing danger the so Satoshi has foreseen ahead the future before taking the decision.I pity all those claimers it actually they are revealing their identities while making such expensive claims because somedays, the variety oppositions of Satoshi may demand they lead them to where the Satoshi really is and failure to be answerable to such quest may be weird.I don't think if Satoshi is being a full length of fool for his anonymity so I think it's high time anyone stay off making such portrays.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: AVE5 on October 12, 2024, 11:27:28 PMFor Satoshi Nakamoto decided to stay anonymous and people going about claiming to know him/her/them in persons are just endangering themselves from the forebeing danger the so Satoshi has foreseen ahead the future before taking the decision.I pity all those claimers it actually they are revealing their identities while making such expensive claims because somedays, the variety oppositions of Satoshi may demand they lead them to where the Satoshi really is and failure to be answerable to such quest may be weird.I don't think if Satoshi is being a full length of fool for his anonymity so I think it's high time anyone stay off making such portrays.People were only concerned about the single aspect of what they are doing without considering the other side of it as well, i know its something that can bring about them being noticed to the whole world being known as the inventor of bitcoin (Satoshi), but they are leaving another aspect of the challenge behind that it could cost them financial loss, public embarrassment and loss of reputation at the cause of getting one, when no one could just simply sign a message to proof themselves.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Quote from: mochi86_ on October 10, 2024, 07:45:12 PMHe makes a very bold statement that he worked alongside Satoshi Nakamoto and know Satoshi personally. He claims that Satoshi Nakamoto isn't a he but two women... One being Vitalik Buterin's aunt Natasha and the other being Anastasia, the sister to Elena Sinelnikova...Looking through what he's claimed about them, he claims that they were part of the Cicada 3301 group and that they were assigned the task to create a decentralized currency being Bitcoin.However, he claims to be recovering from retrograde amnesia in his profile.Thats great! well done to him.Now - what exactually are we supposed to do with that information? Knowing who Satoshi is wont change anything, wont change Bitcoin for better or worse so whats the point in thisendless search to try an uncover Satoshi's identity?Satoshi has left this space and left the wallets associated behind as part of the legacy. Bitcoinhas moved on a very long way since all that happened, its kind of irrelevant who Satoshi isnow, the network has moved on considerably.

comments.author: fikrett
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on October 16, 2024, 09:04:00 AMQuote from: mochi86_ on October 10, 2024, 07:45:12 PMHe makes a very bold statement that he worked alongside Satoshi Nakamoto and know Satoshi personally. He claims that Satoshi Nakamoto isn't a he but two women... One being Vitalik Buterin's aunt Natasha and the other being Anastasia, the sister to Elena Sinelnikova...Looking through what he's claimed about them, he claims that they were part of the Cicada 3301 group and that they were assigned the task to create a decentralized currency being Bitcoin.However, he claims to be recovering from retrograde amnesia in his profile.Thats great! well done to him.Now - what exactually are we supposed to do with that information? Knowing who Satoshi is wont change anything, wont change Bitcoin for better or worse so whats the point in thisendless search to try an uncover Satoshi's identity?Satoshi has left this space and left the wallets associated behind as part of the legacy. Bitcoinhas moved on a very long way since all that happened, its kind of irrelevant who Satoshi isnow, the network has moved on considerably.And it will stay that way. That is, even if Satoshi would be revealed, that would be just a big headache for him, because everybody would want a piece of that revelation, - the govs, news, journalists, and so on.

comments.author: avp2306
comments.body: New character unlock lol.Are you guys not tired about pure speculation matter regarding on the real identity of Satoshi? Now claiming that he's a girl stir up everything. I really believe that Satoshi Nakamoto identity will not be found forever since for sure that he's good on hiding his true identity.Until no proof shown those claims by Mike Hydes will remain a statement. Anyways lets see more statement like this if there's another name will show up then claim something new again, its like these people playing the curious mind of those who follow this case.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.created_time: October 16, 2024, 11:35:06 AMLast edit: October 16, 2024, 02:30:59 PM by Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: mochi86_ on October 10, 2024, 07:45:12 PMHowever, he claims to be recovering from retrograde amnesia in his profile.I am in no way mocking him for his illness. But I wouldn't take most things that somebody who is suffering from memory problems seriously. Quote from: avp2306 on October 16, 2024, 10:10:50 AMNew character unlock lol.Are you guys not tired about pure speculation matter regarding on the real identity of Satoshi? Now claiming that he's a girl stir up everything. I really believe that Satoshi Nakamoto identity will not be found forever since for sure that he's good on hiding his true identity.This is another dimension of the lies about Satoshi. Insinuating that Satoshi is two women is laughable. There is no proof to back this claim, so that's another speculation. Mike Hydes is simply an attention seeker who wants to grow his social media followers.

comments.author: fikrett
comments.body: Quote from: Fiatless on October 16, 2024, 11:35:06 AMAre you guys not tired about pure speculation matter regarding on the real identity of Satoshi? Now claiming that he's a girl stir up everything. I really believe that Satoshi Nakamoto identity will not be found forever since for sure that he's good on hiding his true identity.This is another dimension of the lies about Satoshi. Insinuating that Satoshi is two women is laughable. There is no proof to back this claim, so that's another speculation. Mike Hydes is simply an attention seeker who wants to grow his school media followers. [/quote]Honestly, I don't think it really matters whether people say he is a woman, a group of them, or a group of grannies - it all boils down to mere speculations for no reason, but sometimes, it can cause a great laugh overall

comments.author: stadus
comments.body: As more and more people claim to know Satoshi or say they are Satoshi, it only makes us believe that Satoshi will never reveal himself. The anonymity is pure, and we’re enjoying it. With the bull run likely here, we’ll probably hear more stories about Satoshi, and honestly, I wouldn’t be surprised if one day a self-proclaimed Satoshi pops up, promoting altcoins and trying to convince us to leave Bitcoin for some useless coins.Let’s cut the nonsense... these baseless claims are like trying to solve a mystery that has no chance of being solved.Bitcoin has been around for so many years.....just think logically, why would he show up now when Bitcoin community is already under government scrutiny? And at this point, the government is a real threat to him, especially since he’s holding such a huge amount of Bitcoin.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: avp2306 on October 16, 2024, 10:10:50 AMAre you guys not tired about pure speculation matter regarding on the real identity of Satoshi? Now claiming that he's a girl stir up everything. I really believe that Satoshi Nakamoto identity will not be found forever since for sure that he's good on hiding his true identity.I don't really have a problem if non-bitcoiners are looking to unearth the mystery behind Satoshi, were i have a problem is when bitcoiners, who should know better are trying to deanonymize another person who has chosen to stay anonymous, simply because he is the creator of BTC, i'm sure we can all agree that being that shouldn't deny him his right to privacy.It is very possible that Satoshi could be dead, but whatever it is, i don't believe that their identity would ever be known, except if they are alive and reveal it themselves.

comments.author: fikrett
comments.body: Quote from: Z-tight on October 16, 2024, 12:27:46 PMQuote from: avp2306 on October 16, 2024, 10:10:50 AMAre you guys not tired about pure speculation matter regarding on the real identity of Satoshi? Now claiming that he's a girl stir up everything. I really believe that Satoshi Nakamoto identity will not be found forever since for sure that he's good on hiding his true identity.I don't really have a problem if non-bitcoiners are looking to unearth the mystery behind Satoshi, were i have a problem is when bitcoiners, who should know better are trying to deanonymize another person who has chosen to stay anonymous, simply because he is the creator of BTC, i'm sure we can all agree that being that shouldn't deny him his right to privacy.It is very possible that Satoshi could be dead, but whatever it is, i don't believe that their identity would ever be known, except if they are alive and reveal it themselves.And then again - why he would do that? Govs and whoever is interested would be on his tail, and he would never be able to be safe and sound afterward. That's my view on it, of course.

comments.author: Finestream
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on October 16, 2024, 09:04:00 AMQuote from: mochi86_ on October 10, 2024, 07:45:12 PMHe makes a very bold statement that he worked alongside Satoshi Nakamoto and know Satoshi personally. He claims that Satoshi Nakamoto isn't a he but two women... One being Vitalik Buterin's aunt Natasha and the other being Anastasia, the sister to Elena Sinelnikova...Looking through what he's claimed about them, he claims that they were part of the Cicada 3301 group and that they were assigned the task to create a decentralized currency being Bitcoin.However, he claims to be recovering from retrograde amnesia in his profile.Thats great! well done to him.Now - what exactually are we supposed to do with that information? Knowing who Satoshi is wont change anything, wont change Bitcoin for better or worse so whats the point in thisendless search to try an uncover Satoshi's identity?Satoshi has left this space and left the wallets associated behind as part of the legacy. Bitcoinhas moved on a very long way since all that happened, its kind of irrelevant who Satoshi isnow, the network has moved on considerably. Exactly my point too. Even if this guy is telling the truth, that won't change anything about bitcoin or how we have known Satoshi. For me, sorry to say, but everything that are out in the internet these days about Satoshi I believe they're just made up lies just to ride with the hype. No one can still beat the original Satoshi, regardless of whatever his gender, he will always gain the spotlight for bitcoin. No need to find actually who really he is.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: In my opinion another speculation story cornering Satoshi Nakamoto is not important any more we need to understand that people won't stop coming with outrageous links and story relating to Satoshi, and if we don't stop feeding their cravings for attention it will only get worse. I don't think any of this story even make sense not to even start a conversation about if they are fact or false.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: In recent time, many forks who tries to get known have come out to make such claims about Satoshi identity and also their acclaimed association with the bitcoin founder, but the fact is that, all of them I just chasing clowd and have no real idea of who and what Satoshi really is so this one also shouldn't be taking seriously.From the guys profile one can already know why he make such claims as this, and it seems that his recovery is not really accurate as stated in the profile, since he still have memory lose and thinking he knows satoshi is this statement.

comments.author: Mia Chloe
comments.body: For quite obvious reasons I really don't seem to care about news concerning Satoshi Nakamoto. Now first and foremost, if the news really doesn't concern a message signed by one of Satoshi's known wallet then I'm not interested much about it because almost anything other than that would just be some rumours to still up unnecessary tension in the market. If you check you will notice that pretty much every so-called news about Satoshi often ends up as trash.Take a look at the HBO drama recently, wasn't surprised to see them trying to convince someone to stage Satoshi. In fact let's say their plan kinda worked since in addition to what the US government did, fees were so high that for the first time in a long time i had to make use of an acceleration service. Thankfully we are back on the bullish trend once again admist the pullback.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: Mia Chloe on October 16, 2024, 06:50:29 PMTake a look at the HBO drama recently, wasn't surprised to see them trying to convince someone to stage Satoshi. In fact let's say their plan kinda worked since in addition to what the US government did, fees were so high that for the first time in a long time i had to make use of an acceleration service. Thankfully we are back on the bullish trend once again admist the pullback.Maybe with the whole HBO documentary on Satoshi, floodgates has been open again, with people claiming to known who is Satoshi, in this case, it's supposedly "two lady", which is another theory that we haven't heard before. But for sure we will debunked it, as we already know that Satoshi indeed has disappeared and won't surface anytime of the day to protect himself and his creation. And I thought that the documentary has no effect at all, but thanks to it, the market is now on the rally and so with it, comes another round of Who is Satoshi round again. But as just what we have seen, positive or negative news, we will still consider it to be good for Bitcoin and the whole crypto. So most likely there someone who will come forward with another potential name of the creator.
